g.text: Version suffix used for PyPI packages (alpha, beta, rc1, etc.).
Use local hatch instead of docker to build the package. You need to have hatch
Directory where the python client repo is checked out
Only publish updated build scripts to puthon client repo, not generated client code.
Security schemes to be added to the API documentation (coma separated)
If dry-run is set, commands are only printed, not executed.
Print verbose information about performed steps.
